<style type="text/css">

#wrapper {
	padding-top: 3px;
	max-width: 840px;
	margin: 0 auto;
}

.message {
	margin-bottom:10px;
	padding-top: 5px;
	border-top: 1px solid #dcdcdc;
}

.comments .message {
	margin-bottom:0;
	padding: 3px 5px;
	border: none;
	border-bottom:solid 1px #e6e6e6;
	border-top:solid 1px #fff;
}

.on {
	border-top: 1px solid #999999;
}

#content {
	/*padding-right: 10px;*/
}

#inputField {
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}

textarea.elastic {
	width: 99%;
	overflow: hidden;
	border: 0px;
	resize: none;
	outline: 0;
	line-height: normal;
	height: 21px;
	-webkit-appearance: caret;
}

.commentField {
	margin-left: 20px;
	padding:4px;
	display: none;
	border-top:solid 1px #fff;
	border-bottom:solid 1px #e6e6e6;
	background:#f0f0f0;
}
.commentField hr {
	display:none;
}

.outer {
	border: 1px #cdcdcd solid;
	padding: 3px;
	margin-bottom: 5px;
	background:#fff;
}

.commentInputDummy {
	padding:4px;
	border-top:solid 1px #fff;
	border-bottom:solid 1px #e6e6e6;
}
.commentInputDummy span {
	display:block;
	padding:2px;
	border: 1px #cdcdcd solid;
	color: #aaaaaa;
	cursor: text;
	background:#fff;
}

.comments {
	margin:5px 0 0 20px;
	background:#f0f0f0;
}

.count {
	padding-right: 5px;
	font-size: 80%;
	*font-size: 75%;
	color: #434343;
}

.alert {
	color: #ff0000;
}

.commentCaption {
	padding:3px 5px;
	font-size:smaller;
	border-top:solid 1px #fff;
	border-bottom:solid 1px #e6e6e6;
}

.readMore {
	margin-top: 5px;
	padding: 3px;
	background: #efefef url(https://app.aipo.com/themes/default/images/common/bg_slash.gif) repeat left top;
	border: 1px #cdcdcd solid;
	text-align: center;
}

.readMore a {
	display: block;
}

.timeline {
	width: 100%;
	word-break: break-all;
	word-wrap: break-word;
}

.timeline .name {
	/*color: #369;*/
	font-weight: bold;
	padding-right: 5px;
}

.timeline .name a {
}

.timeline .name a:hover {
}

.timeline .body {
	padding-top: 3px;
	min-height: 25px;
	padding-bottom: 5px;
}

.timeline .time {
	margin-bottom:3px;
	font-size: 80%;
	*font-size: 75%;
	color: #434343;
}

br {
	letter-spacing: 0;
}

.iconLike,
.iconComment {
	display:inline-block;
	width:14px;
	height:14px;
	vertical-align:middle;
	background:url(https://s3-ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/gadgets.aipo.com/microblog/img/icon/social_icons.gif) no-repeat;
}
.iconLike {background-position:-2px -2px;}
.iconComment {background-position:-2px -17px;}

.dialog {
	position:absolute;
	z-index:9999;
}
.dialog_inner {
	padding:5px;
	background:#fff;
	border-radius:3px;
}
.dialog_contents {
	border:solid 5px #999;
	border-radius:3px;
	background:#fff;
}
.dialog_header {
	padding:5px;
	font-weight:bold;
	overflow:hidden;
	border-bottom:solid 1px #ccc;
	background:#eee;
}
.dialog_header .left {
	float:left;
	width:100%;
	margin-right:-25px;
}
.dialog_header .left div {
	margin-right:25px;
}
.dialog_header .right {
	float:right;
	width:25px;
	text-align:right;
	vertical-align:middle;
}
.dialog_body {
	padding:5px;
	overflow-y:auto;
	overflow-x:hidden;
	box-shadow:inset 0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}
.dialog_footer {
	padding:5px;
	border-top:solid 1px #ccc;
	background:#f0f0f0;
}
.userList {
	margin:0;
	padding:0;
}
.userList li {
	padding:5px;
	border-bottom:solid 1px #eee;
}

input[type=submit],
input[type=button],
input[type=reset],
button {
	display:inline-block;
	color:#000;
	text-decoration:none;
	text-align:center;
	text-shadow:0 1px 0 #f8f8f8;
	vertical-align:middle;
	cursor:pointer;
	border:solid 1px #ccc;
	border-radius:2px;
	-ms-border-radius:2px;
	background:#f0f0f0;
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#fff), to(#f0f0f0));/*Ch*/
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #f0f0f0);/*Fx*/
}
input[type=submit],
input[type=button],
input[type=reset],
button {
	height:2em;
	>line-height:1.7em;/*IE*/
	padding:0 0.5em;
	>padding:0 0.1em;/*IE*/
}
input[type=submit]:hover,
input[type=button]:hover,
input[type=reset],
button:hover {
	color:#000;
	border:solid 1px #999;
	box-shadow:0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
	background:#e0e0e0;
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#eee), to(#e1e1e1));/*Ch*/
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #eee, #e1e1e1);/*Fx*/
}
input[type=submit]:active,
input[type=button]:active,
input[type=reset],
button:active {
	border:solid 1px #999;
	box-shadow:0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0);
	background:#ccc;
	background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#e1e1e1), to(#eee));/*Ch*/
	background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #e1e1e1, #eee);/*Fx*/
}
input[type=submit],
input[type=button],
input[type=reset] {
	padding:0 0.4em;
}
